sqlMap.select: select LOG_ID, USER_ID, USER_NAME, LOG_DESC, to_char(OPERATOR_TIME,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:Mi:ss') OPERATOR_TIME from T01_SYS_LOG where 1=1 and USER_NAME like '%'||#userName#||'%' and LOG_DESC like '%'||#logDesc#||'%' order by LOG_ID desc
select count(1) from T01_SYS_LOG where 1=1 and USER_NAME like '%'||#userName#||'%' and LOG_DESC like '%'||#logDesc#||'%'
